mapper.update:
update tbl_activity
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR},
cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_activity set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, cost = #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, edit_time = #{editTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, edit_by = #{editBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity (id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

delete from tbl_activity where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.name,u.id owner,start_date,end_date,us.name create_by,a.cost,a.description,a.create_time, u3.name edit_by,a.edit_time edit_time from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner inner join tbl_user us on us.id = a.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = a.edit_by where a.id = #{id}

select a.id,a.name,u.name owner,start_date,end_date,us.name create_by,a.cost,a.description,a.create_time, u3.name edit_by,a.edit_time edit_time from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner inner join tbl_user us on us.id = a.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = a.edit_by

select a.id,a.name,u.name owner,start_date,end_date,us.name create_by,a.cost,a.description,a.create_time, u3.name edit_by,a.edit_time edit_time from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner inner join tbl_user us on us.id = a.create_by left join tbl_user u3 on u3.id = a.edit_by where a.id = #{id}

#{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_activity (id, owner, name, start_date, end_date, cost, description, create_time, create_by) values
(#{activity.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activity.owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activity.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity.startDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activity.endDate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activity.cost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activity.createTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{activity.createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select a.id , a.name , u.name owner , a.start_date , a.end_date from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner inner join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on car.activity_id = a.id where car.clue_id = #{clueId}

select a.id , a.name , u.name owner , a.start_date , a.end_date from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.id = a.owner
and a.name like '%${name}%'
and a.id not in (select activity_id from tbl_clue_activity_relation where clue_id = #{clueId})
